summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the purchase in lieu of condemnation of certain property and property rights necessary for the improvement of Northeast 42nd Street between Roosevelt Way Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast and the improvement of Northeast 50th Street between 4th Avenue Northeast and 5th Avenue Northeast and between 7th Avenue Northeast and the alley east thereof; authorizing expenditures by the Law and Engineering Departments and making appropriations from the City Street Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
